abilities.description: Acid Bather: Acid damage rolls affect it as healing rolls. Immutable: It can't be transformed. Magic Ward I: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d4 penalty. Unbaked: If it takes 5 or more Fire damage at once, it is Dazed (Cd4). HD: 9 (40 HP) Speed: 20' Zone: Frontline Morale: 10 # Appearing:1 Senses: Darksight Armor: 0 [as Unarmored] Immune: Cold, Poison, Shock; Physical from non-Relics Weak: Fire Status Immunities: Charmed, Fatigued, Paralyzed, Sickened ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Slam Slam [Melee Attack]: 9 (2d8 (+2 if this Being is Berserk)) ABILITIES Bloodied Rage: At 20 HP or less, it is Berserk.
